name: 破音乱斗
summary:
Have you ever shout because you're losing in a game? Now you can win this game by your voice!  
We fused voice control and online battle together to try our best to make a fun game. 
In this game, one player will battle with three other players from all over the world. Players move their characters by keyboard but they will only attack when the player use his voice. 
Get your voice a magical ability, knockdown your friends with your voice and burst out laughing together!
